import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from "axios"; function Recipes() { const [recipes, setRecipes] = useState(); const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const openModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(true); }; const closeModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(false); }; useEffect(()=>{ getRecipes(); },[]); const getRecipes= async()=>{ let response = await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/recipe/getAllRecipes"); setRecipes(response.data); } return (

Latest Recipes

{ recipes?.map((recipe,index)=>{ return( <>

{recipe.recipe_title}

{recipe.prep_time}

) }) } {isModalOpen && (

) } export default Recipes
